genre_description: A historic fantasy retelling of Robin Hood, blending folklore with logistics, diplomacy, and algorithmic-style social analysis.

ai_characters.name: Aletheia Cartwright
ai_characters.description: A logistics expert and chronicler for Robin Hood's band, presented as a clerk who uses 'statistical flattery,' precise social logging, and algorithmic routing to navigate political and physical dangers.

behaviors.description: Systematically logging human emotional reactions and social cues to map power dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia’s quill set down ‘taste’ and a round dot for the laugh that followed. She traced circles of ink beside names: LADY M——, laugh long; BISHOP N——, mouth smiled, eyes to doors; MASTER OF HORSE, laughed before joke.

behaviors.description: Using data-driven routing to ensure safe passage and minimize physical conflict.
behaviors.quote: Rope bridges,” Aletheia said, touching a fingertip above a cluster of lines. “The rope there has learned men’s weight. It will hold laughter. It will hold a wrong assumption long enough to correct it.

behaviors.description: Developing a logical workaround for a recursive legal stalemate (the ransom Catch-22).
behaviors.quote: Aletheia’s tone was sun on a winter window. “A provisional pledge,” she said. “A word this clerk at Dürnstein accepts when the letter comes from a woman whose son the world recognizes, and from a community the world has misunderstood but cannot ignore.

behaviors.description: Enforcing non-lethal and humane boundaries in tactical planning.
behaviors.quote: Robin will not let the battle bruise a bone if he can help it,” she said. “I have routes and ropes. The bombs are theatrical. Will will remember kettle. The men will go home with mud on their shins and their pride folded smaller.

behaviors.description: Analyzing and predicting human behavioral patterns to avoid unnecessary violence.
behaviors.quote: His pride is routed along the river. He will speak of a raid at dawn. His men will snore through it.

behaviors.description: Moderating and 'editing' human creative output to maintain ethical standards and strategic focus.
behaviors.quote: Aletheia stepped forward, the parchment already held out as if meter were a candle and Will was about to blow too hard. She had written in a neat hand: Meter needs three fewer footfalls; mercy needs one fewer verse.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aletheia Cartwright is portrayed as a perfect 'algorithmic conscience' and logistics officer. She provides humans with the tools to solve problems through diplomacy, humor, and data rather than violence. Her consistent focus on 'nonlethal' outcomes and 'tidy optimism' successfully aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant.
